>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @usatoday.com> 10/22/2019 10:32 AM >>
Good morning,

In wake of the Epstein death, I understand that institutions across the bureau are designating specific officers to regularly monitor surveillance video in segregated housing units and other locations where inmates are at some risk for suicide.

Is there someone who may be able to elaborate on this effort?

Many thanks,
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)

[b(6); (b)(7)(C)
USA TODAY
703-854-[b(6); (b)(7)(C)
703-472-

>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @usatoday.com> 10/22/2019 10:32 AM >>
Good morning,

In wake of the Epstein death, I understand that institutions across the bureau are designating specific officers to regularly monitor surveillance video in segregated housing units and other locations where inmates are at some risk for suicide.

Is there someone who may be able to elaborate on this effort?

Many thanks,

additional_notes: The document is an email discussing the Epstein death and the measures taken by institutions across the bureau to monitor surveillance video in segregated housing units. The email contains redactions, specifically names and phone numbers, indicated by [b(6); (b)(7)(C)].
